Posts.Content: travelgal6979 wrote: Hi Ladies.  I'm asking a question regarding a lumpectomy that my sister is having tomorrow.  I had a BMX last February so I'm not familiar with the lumpectomy procedure.   She told me that the BS will not be giving her any general OR local anesthesia.  She's very panicked about it obviously.  I just can't believe that a doctor wouldnot give her at least a "local".  It sounds totally medieval.  I'm wondering if she may have misunderstood.  Could some gals fill me in on what your MS gave you.  Thank you so much.  Diane Dx 12/3/2009, ILC, <1cm, Stage IB, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy Procedure - Question travelgal6979 Fearless_One

Posts.Content: travelgal6979 wrote: Hi there all.   I'm due to have my exchange surgery in September.  I'm not sure if I understand this correctly but it looked as those some gals were saying that the PS brings different sizes of implants into the OR to see which works best.  Is that correct?   If so, will the PS wake me up to see which size I want or does he make the decision?  Thank you! Diane Dx 12/3/2009, ILC, <1cm, Stage IB, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Question about exchange surgery... travelgal6979 MBJ
